page.title: 15FELTWELL PARISH COUNCIL (2)
page.content: { THE WORK OF FELTWELL PARISH COUNCIL} The Council employ someone to cut the grass on the village green and in St. Nicholas' Church cemetery. In the last two years the Council put three new aluminium bus shelters in the village. Feltwell and Methwold Parish councils get together and organise a coach to take children to the Thetford Sports centre in the summer holidays. Sometimes a larger project is put before the council. For example in 1983 the Council held a public meeting to set up the Feltwell Youth and Community Centre Management Committee. They then worked very hard to raise money to build an extension to the Youth Centre. After obtaining grants from West Norfolk Borough Council and Norfolk County Council finally sufficient money was raised and the extension was built.
